channel.title: I Try To Make A Shop
channel.description:
Hey mopar, i need help because when i make a shop, it dose this.
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/6ihg6c.jpg[/img]
Help [Using Delta]

item.title: I Try To Make A Shop
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“JoshRawly, post:5, topic:401827”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=498886.msg3648312#msg3648312 date=1309546088]
The problem is probably that you didn’t include the shop id on that line. I believe the shop id goes first, then name (and I think the name needs to replace spaces with underscores.)
[/quote] I Changed it around still same error
this right?

[/quote]

The npcs have no baring on the shops.

You need to move the shop code to shops.cfg, and then in the server add the “Npc Option” for the Npc to open up the shop. Then in autospawn.cfg, you tell it where to spawn the Npc.

Read full topic
item.source: I Try To Make A Shop
